channel.title: CVE Feed for Jordy Meow -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jordy Meow -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-38513|2023-12-20T13:52:29.820Z -- jordy%20meow -- photo%20engine%20%28media%20organizer%20%26%20lightroom%29
item.description: Authorization Bypass Through User-Controlled Key vulnerability in Jordy Meow Photo Engine (Media Organizer & Lightroom).This issue affects Photo Engine (Media Organizer & Lightroom): from n/a through 6.2.5.

item.title: CVE-2023-51409|2024-06-04T17:20:46.510Z -- jordy%20meow -- ai%20engine%3A%20chatgpt%20chatbot
item.description: Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type vulnerability in Jordy Meow AI Engine: ChatGPT Chatbot.This issue affects AI Engine: ChatGPT Chatbot: from n/a through 1.9.98.

item.title: CVE-2023-51508|2024-02-06T11:11:03.733Z -- jordy%20meow -- database%20cleaner%3A%20clean%2C%20optimize%20%26%20repair
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in Jordy Meow Database Cleaner: Clean, Optimize & Repair.This issue affects Database Cleaner: Clean, Optimize & Repair: from n/a through 0.9.8.

item.title: CVE-2023-44991|2023-12-19T15:34:19.591Z -- jordy%20meow -- media%20file%20renamer%3A%20rename%20files%20%28manual%2C%20auto%20%26%20ai%29
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in Jordy Meow Media File Renamer: Rename Files (Manual, Auto & AI).This issue affects Media File Renamer: Rename Files (Manual, Auto & AI): from n/a through 5.6.9.

item.title: CVE-2023-44982|2023-12-19T00:03:30.190Z -- jordy%20meow -- perfect%20images%20%28manage%20image%20sizes%2C%20thumbnails%2C%20replace%2C%20retina%29
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in Jordy Meow Perfect Images (Manage Image Sizes, Thumbnails, Replace, Retina).This issue affects Perfect Images (Manage Image Sizes, Thumbnails, Replace, Retina): from n/a through 6.4.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-1434|2024-06-04T18:00:30.717Z -- jordy%20meow -- media%20alt%20renamer
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Jordy Meow Media Alt Renamer allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Media Alt Renamer: from n/a through 0.0.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-29100|2024-03-28T05:10:42.639Z -- jordy%20meow -- ai%20engine%3A%20chatgpt%20chatbot
item.description: Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type vulnerability in Jordy Meow AI Engine: ChatGPT Chatbot.This issue affects AI Engine: ChatGPT Chatbot: from n/a through 2.1.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-29090|2024-03-28T05:12:03.096Z -- jordy%20meow -- ai%20engine%3A%20chatgpt%20chatbot
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in Jordy Meow AI Engine: ChatGPT Chatbot.This issue affects AI Engine: ChatGPT Chatbot: from n/a through 2.1.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-33922|2024-06-04T17:44:03.831Z -- jordy%20meow -- wp%20media%20cleaner
item.description: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File vulnerability in Jordy Meow WP Media Cleaner.This issue affects WP Media Cleaner: from n/a through 6.7.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-34440|2024-06-04T17:42:35.827Z -- jordy%20meow -- ai%20engine%3A%20chatgpt%20chatbot
item.description: Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type vulnerability in Jordy Meow AI Engine: ChatGPT Chatbot.This issue affects AI Engine: ChatGPT Chatbot: from n/a through 2.2.63.

item.title: CVE-2024-35712|2024-06-10T17:07:06.360Z -- jordy%20meow -- database%20cleaner
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Jordy Meow Database Cleaner allows Relative Path Traversal.This issue affects Database Cleaner: from n/a through 1.0.5.
